title: Movistar Still Searching for its New Ace: The Once-Mighty Grand Tour Machine Locked in Holding Pattern
content:
Analysis: Davide Formolo and RÃ©mi Cavagna bring confirmed firepower, but better-funded rivals continue to outpace Spain's lone elite men's WorldTour team on the road and in new transfers.
